title: Resident Lounge, 2 Swimming Pools, Sand Volleyball Court
posting_body: ['Nestled on 42 beautiful acres, The Preston Apartments in McDonough, GA offers a unique combination of rural beauty and urban convenience in a luxurious community perfectly located in the Atlanta Suburbs.', 'Smartly designed interiors, outstanding resident service, and resort-style amenities make The Preston is the perfect choice to call home.', 'Property Amenities:', 'GOChat Business Center', 'Playground', 'Resident Lounge', 'Car Care Center', 'Tennis Court', 'BBQ Area', 'Gated Community', 'Sand Volleyball Court', 'Pet Stations', '24 Hour Maintenance', '2 Swimming Pools', 'Free Wellness Classes', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.', 'Photos may not be of your exact home.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!', 'Professionally managed by GoldOller Real Estate Investments, a provider of Fair Housing and Equal Opportunity.']
